about_the_game:
Game Plot:


You take role of young alchemist Annelle who embarks on a quest to find philosopher's stone on the orders of Dark Amethyst guild. This legendary substance, capable of turning any metal into gold, is rumored to be hidden among numerous other riches in abandoned alchemists' dungeon near the city of Gelbin. No one who ventured into the dungeon did emerge back, but even this didn't stop Annelle. Once she enters the dungeon, Annelle finds that she is locked inside...

Key Features:

  • Explore fully randomly generated dungeon (no pre-drawn patterns at all)

  • Combine 4 ingredients in any way to create 60+ helpful potions

  • Upgrade 20+ magical runes with 9 gems as you need

  • Unique gas mechanics involving gas physics

  • Experience true pixel art in 320x180 resolution
  • Game supports 3 types of controls: gamepad, keyboard + mouse and keyboard only
detailed_description:
Game Plot:


You take role of young alchemist Annelle who embarks on a quest to find philosopher's stone on the orders of Dark Amethyst guild. This legendary substance, capable of turning any metal into gold, is rumored to be hidden among numerous other riches in abandoned alchemists' dungeon near the city of Gelbin. No one who ventured into the dungeon did emerge back, but even this didn't stop Annelle. Once she enters the dungeon, Annelle finds that she is locked inside...

Key Features:

  • Explore fully randomly generated dungeon (no pre-drawn patterns at all)

  • Combine 4 ingredients in any way to create 60+ helpful potions

  • Upgrade 20+ magical runes with 9 gems as you need

  • Unique gas mechanics involving gas physics

  • Experience true pixel art in 320x180 resolution
  • Game supports 3 types of controls: gamepad, keyboard + mouse and keyboard only

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: The young alchemist girl Annelle, on the orders of the Dark Amethyst guild, sets off in search of a philosopher's stone. The rumors about riches in abandoned alchemists' dungeon, indicated its location. Having reached the dungeon and going into it, Annelle was locked inside...
